description: Integer part of Chebyshev's theta function: floor( log(prod_{k=1..n} prime(k)) ).
references: J. W. Sander, A story of binomial coefficients and primes, Amer. Math. Monthly 102 (1995), 802-807.
links: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: a(n) = A000195(A002110(n)).a(n) ~ n log n by the prime number theorem.
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
extensions: Added asymptotic formula and name. - Charles R Greathouse IV Dec 11 2008
